channel.title: Vote4Cash
channel.description: Im not understanding the mysql part of it? what do i do to set up the mysql part?

item.title: Vote4Cash
item.dc:creator: @why_so_serious why so serious
item.description:
@why_so_serious wrote:

[quote=“Mayhem, post:3, topic:396319”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=493487.msg3608451#msg3608451 date=1306336354]
-mysql user is the user for the database can be seen if you look at what you added
-same with mysql pass
-mysql database the name will be listed
-mysql host is the host it will list that as well

its fairly common sense if you have installed a smf board via a web host before you can do this.
[/quote][/quote]
don’t spam. :l

Read full topic
